
A careless developer reused a prime across two RSA keys. Can you exploit their shared factors to recover the message? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 1627729345998194486417466294213985171699652453921103223863373519589843931615320314002490109703778042904082469771230628407917926157663568408774641968645359, ciphertext2: 5663171222591496965535449602495740669289763542467868794417971125616901543467904377075036180103106236367441226965505296417324535486485857478554808699812900


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10060657050345535911180249674220480520207222494144903894584571342019267028670476784590860952290037204539156752143988842839192686447799871415069047521058563, n2=8703762970771780975900612639668631033549797125327780188984514064947133459565801736207883972410506731506672749006042016119877051771978777530799703156520169, e=3402739582418075540716784998277219797871428913647498720495780117971678874282834758522738295162934882634668327712446735036906936791761951445038186985014461

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{i5wlg5ad}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 1627729345998194486417466294213985171699652453921103223863373519589843931615320314002490109703778042904082469771230628407917926157663568408774641968645359, ciphertext2: 5663171222591496965535449602495740669289763542467868794417971125616901543467904377075036180103106236367441226965505296417324535486485857478554808699812900
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10060657050345535911180249674220480520207222494144903894584571342019267028670476784590860952290037204539156752143988842839192686447799871415069047521058563, n2=8703762970771780975900612639668631033549797125327780188984514064947133459565801736207883972410506731506672749006042016119877051771978777530799703156520169, e=3402739582418075540716784998277219797871428913647498720495780117971678874282834758522738295162934882634668327712446735036906936791761951445038186985014461
extra_info: p=111272221617948114867758822783003071765445980056210026369241546552503016062059, q=90414812466751005097934794867206312808095487682225712662364580232919373286857, r=96264790395627801595155848345496913763759377265512321735360110720066883894817, φ(n1)=10060657050345535911180249674220480520207222494144903894584571342019267028670275097556776253170071510921506542759415301371454250708768265288283625131709648, φ(n2)=8703762970771780975900612639668631033549797125327780188984514064947133459565615056605021593603813640863460045779470161254929313737581052839846716899338496
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
